unit.data.cryoptera.name: Cryoptera
unit.data.cryoptera.lore: Underworld creature that roams underground and are only found on the surface when summoned by magic practitioners. They typically feeds on Pacifiers and other mana-filled beings. They can absorb and regurgitate Mana into different forms and shapes.
unit.data.cryoptera.combo.2: Gain a <style="value">Blue</style> Mana and a <style="value">Blue</style> Crystal
unit.data.cryoptera.description.visuals: Large blue bat with long fangs and large ears. Emanates ice or cold energy.
